          "atmosphere": "Mechanical crisis and mounting dread"

        "pov_character": "Elias",

          "Primary lamp mechanism begins failing during storm",
          "Elias struggles with emergency repairs as backup systems strain",
          "Witnesses subtle changes in ocean behavior as light dims"

          "Grinding metal of failing gears against his palms",
          "Unnatural silence between waves far below"

      {
        "id": "SCENE-004",

          "location": "Lighthouse lamp room and surrounding waters",
          "time": "Deep night, continuous from previous scene",
          "atmosphere": "Cosmic horror revelation"

        "pov_character": "Elias",

          "Light fails completely for seventeen minutes",
          "Elias witnesses something immense stirring in the depths",
          "Manages to restore illumination just as presence begins rising"

        "sensory_anchors": [
          "Phosphorescent disturbance patterns in black water",
          "Subsonic vibrations resonating through his bones"
        ],
        "emotional_arc": "Terror crystallizing into grim understanding",

        "word_count_target": 1200
      },
      {
        "id": "SCENE-005",
        "title": "The Acceptance",

          "location": "Lighthouse lamp room",
          "time": "Dawn, following morning",
          "atmosphere": "Resigned duty"

        "pov_character": "Elias",

          "Elias reinforces the light mechanisms with permanent modifications",
          "Burns the previous keepers' records to protect future guardians",
          "Settles into his eternal vigil with full knowledge of its necessity"

          "Acrid smoke of burning documents",
          "Steady beam cutting through morning mist"
